articles.title: ‘The Last of Us’ Is The Most Pirated TV Show of 2023 - TorrentFreak
articles.description: HBO's 'The Last of Us' is the most-pirated TV show released in 2023, taking over the title from ‘House of the Dragon’.
articles.content: At the end of every year, we take a look at the most-downloaded TV shows among torrenting pirates.For several years in a row, the list was headed by Game of Thrones but that reign came to an end afte… [+1601 chars]
